project_summary: A short promotional video showcasing a chill rooftop BBQ spot in Saigon, garnering thousands of social media views.
project_description_detailed: Video production for Independence BBQ. The content highlights the airy rooftop space, nostalgic decor, and appetizing grilled dishes. Features fast-paced editing and warm color grading to evoke emotion and appetite.
caption: A chill rooftop BBQ recommendation in Saigon - Independence BBQ.
